general.command_error: An error occurred while executing the command.

tickets.transcript_description:
A transcript has been generated for ticket {ticket_number}.

The transcript file is attached to this message. You can download it and open it in any web browser to view the complete ticket history.
tickets.logs_purpose_description: This channel will receive all ticket transcripts when tickets are closed or deleted. Staff members can view these transcripts for reference and record-keeping.
tickets.logs_channel_description: This channel has been set up to receive ticket transcripts and logs.
tickets.logs_setup_success: Ticket logs channel has been successfully set up!
tickets.logs_setup_error: There was an error setting up the ticket logs channel. Please try again later.
tickets.provide_details: Welcome to the ticket system! Click the button below to create a new ticket. Our staff team will assist you as soon as possible.
tickets.select_category: Need help or have a question? Select a category from the dropdown menu after clicking the button below.
tickets.click_to_create: Click the button below to create a new ticket.
tickets.category_donation_desc: Receive your donations on the server
tickets.category_question_desc: Ask questions related to the server
tickets.response_time_desc: Our staff team typically responds within a few hours. Please be patient and provide detailed information about your request.
tickets.faq_description: Here are some frequently asked questions and their answers.
tickets.rules_description: Please read and follow these server rules.

settings.language_changed: Language has been changed to English
settings.cleanup_success: Successfully cleaned up the following items:
settings.cleanup_error: An error occurred while cleaning up the server.
settings.nothing_to_cleanup: No items were selected for cleanup.

commands.help_description: Get help with ticket system commands

faq.question: Question
faq.add_error: An error occurred while adding the FAQ.
faq.edit_error: An error occurred while editing the FAQ.
faq.edit_no_changes: You must provide either a new question or a new answer.
faq.delete_error: An error occurred while deleting the FAQ.
faq.not_found: FAQ not found or does not belong to this server.

rules.edit_error: An error occurred while editing the server rule.
rules.edit_no_changes: You must provide either a new title or a new description.
rules.delete_error: An error occurred while deleting the server rule.
rules.rule_exists: A rule with this number already exists. Use the edit command to modify it.
rules.list_description: Here are all the server rules:
rules.list_error: An error occurred while listing the server rules.
rules.no_rules: No server rules found for this server.

rules.acknowledge: I have read and agree to the rules
rules.acknowledge_prompt: Please read the rules above and click the button below to acknowledge that you have read and agree to follow them.
